[[File:The Hobbit (1979 radio series).jp: '''The Hobbit''' is a [[1979]] radio series of ''[[The Hobbit]]'', adapted and directed by [[Bob Lewis]] and produced by [[Mind's Eye]]. It would reuse most of the cast for their [[The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)
thumb: radio series]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' of the same year.
